tool.name: ms-vfetc
tool.description: converts MS vendor exports to a generic tabular file.
tool.help: MS vendor export format converter. Turns targeted metabolomics data from Agilent, Sciex, Shimadzu and Waters into a more suitable format for data analysis. Please note! this does not convert the raw formats, only the exported text formats. More information and examples can be found at: https://github.com/phnmnl/container-ms-vfetc.
